title: Giulio Carlo de' Toschi di Fagnano
summary: Giulio Carlo, Count Fagnano, Marquis de Toschi (26 September 1682 â€” 18 May 1766)[1] was an Italian mathematician. He was probably the first to direct attention to the theory of elliptic integrals. Fagnano was born in Senigallia (at the time spelled "Sinigaglia"), and also died there.[1]
